allow: Bash(DEBUG=true APPROVAL_MODE=yolo npx tsx src/cli.tsx --prompt "Create a simple TypeScript utility function file called math-utils.ts with functions for add, subtract, multiply, and divide operations. Include proper TypeScript types and JSDoc comments for each function." --non-interactive)
